post.body: Verging on a fight in the shops but I got a few things. Loved your top of the pops performance btw :)
Just got back from the shops, got a few things but I'm still freezing we had to walk for ages from the nearest car park in the cold :(
Listening to my CDs that I got for Christmas, nothing much else seems to be happening :(
Merry Christmas everyone, feels like I'm saying that on every single website I have an account on atm lol
Relaxing again, seem to be doing a lot of that atm! I'll end up doing way more housework later so it's probably just as well
Changed my avatar on here, great isn't it? :p
Just finished writing Christmas cards, that's that for another year then!
Relaxing, listening to the Peter Kay Christmas song!
Listening to music, would be on MSN but I can't really be bothered
Listening to the lorry driver song, by the legend that is Chris Moyles!
Relaxing loads, is it just me or is youtube being really slooooooooooow today?
just tried to learn a dance routine but it went a bit fast for me, I think I'll stick to doing my own stuff ;)
In full forum-posting mode atm :)
Back in school finally, wasn't bad but somebody was kicking off big-stylee over lack of birthday presents
Still off sick, getting better but I have a really bad cough :( I'm going in tomorrow though, unless I'm rendered completely immobile
I'm really ill at the moment, trying to rest as much as I can
Nothing much is happening, I was shopping for 6 hours non stop today, absolute bliss but my feet are killing me now!
I'm waiting to go to parents' evening, I'm not doing much really
I've just had a cup of tea, I feel much better now :-)
Nothing much is happening today, everyone else is at the cinema but I have to do stupid chemistry revision
